hypothesis_content.title: High-Beta Altcoin Momentum Reversal Post-BTC Consolidation
hypothesis_content.statement: Following 5 days of BTC trading in a tight range (±1.5% daily range) during a NEUTRAL/BULL regime, a subsequent BTC daily close > +1.5% will trigger outsized momentum in high-beta altcoins (SOL, AVAX, PEPE) over the next 2 days, with the altcoin basket returning 1.5x-2x BTC's return.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Consolidation builds energy and squeezes out weak hands. A strong BTC move after compression forces rapid re-leveraging into high-beta alts as traders chase performance. Neutral funding reduces immediate long liquidation risk.
entry_conditions: BTC exhibits 5 consecutive days with daily range < 1.5% (consolidation)
BTC then has a daily close > +1.5% from prior close
Aggregate altcoin (SOL, AVAX, PEPE) funding rates are neutral or negative (not excessively long)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Altcoin basket (SOL/AVAX/PEPE avg) return reaches 2x the BTC return from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Altcoin basket return is ≤ 0.8x the BTC return after 1 day

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Altcoin basket fails to outperform BTC (return ratio < 1.2x) in more than 60% of historical instances meeting entry criteria.
